table.caption: Minor Beneficial Properties
rows: While attuned to the Artifact, you gain proficiency in one skill of the DM's choice.
While attuned to the Artifact, you have Immunity to the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition.
While attuned to the Artifact, you have Immunity to the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} and {@condition Frightened|XPHB} conditions.
While attuned to the Artifact, you have Resistance to one damage type of the DM's choice.
While attuned to the Artifact, you can cast one cantrip (chosen by the DM) from it.

While attuned to the Artifact, you can cast one level 1 spell (chosen by the DM) from it. After you cast the spell, roll {@dice 1d6}. On a roll of 1–5, you can't cast it again in this way until the next dawn.
As 61–70 above, except the spell is level 2.
As 61–70 above, except the spell is level 3.
While attuned to the Artifact, you gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.
